list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: moisture exuded through the pores of the skin, typically in profuse quantities as a reaction to heat, physical exertion, fever, or fear.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: beads of sweat broke out on her brow
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hạt mồ hôi nổ tung trên trán
Anh đang đổ mồ hôi đầm đìa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: heat (chopped vegetables) slowly in a pan with a small amount of fat, so that they cook in their own juices.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: sweat the celery and onions with olive oil and seasoning
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đổ mồ hôi cần tây và hành tây bằng dầu ô liu và gia vị

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: subject (metal) to surface melting, especially to fasten or join by solder without a soldering iron.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the tire is sweated onto the wooden parts
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: lốp xe bị đổ mồ hôi vào các bộ phận bằng gỗ
